name: Around (ma_jetteleger)
description:
[PROTOTYPE]

Around is an attempt at creating a game based around circles and an experiment in circular level design, all centered on the aesthetics of abstract geometrical shapes.

You control the white circle on each level. Avoid obstacles and reach the center of the level to progress.

How to play : 

Windows and web platforms
- Move the mouse around until you highlight an adjacent node
- Click in the direction you want the white circle to move when a node is highlighted
- Click while moving to alter the speed of the white circle
- Alt-F4 to quit the game (if you downloaded the game of windows)

Android
- Press and drag a finger around until you highlight an adjacent node
- Release your finger in the direction you want the white circle to move when a node is highlighted
- Tap while moving to alter the speed of the white circle
